intro: In a forest full of life, a shining river connects all the creatures that inhabit it. Three young adventurers discover that this river is not just running water.
description:
Discover the magic of friendship in this exciting family visual novel.

Join Luna, a brave kitten, her curious brother Leo, and their clever friend Rocky the raccoon on an unforgettable adventure.

Guided by ancient magical clues and facing a series of fun and challenging tests, this unique trio must work together to protect the mysterious lifeblood that keeps their world in harmony.

Highlights:

Magical Scenarios: Explore enchanted forests, secret ruins, and landscapes that come to life.

Loving Characters: Each with their own personality, special abilities, and a touch of humor that will delight young and old.

Valuable Lessons: Learn about unity, bravery, and respect for nature while having fun.

Family Fun: Accessible controls and a story that connects with players of all ages.

·This celebration of friendship and teamwork is perfect for playing together, discovering secrets, and enjoying magical moments as a family.

·Ideal for children and parents looking for magical adventures full of heart.

Ready to embark on this magical adventure? The world of Luna, Leo, and Rocky awaits!
